item.title: SQL Injection (SQLi) Unmasked: Advanced Exploits, Defense Tactics, and Industry Lessons
item.description: SQL Injection (SQLi) remains one of the most pervasive and damaging web application vulnerabilities, accounting for 33% of all web breaches in 2023. This deep dive explores its mechanics, evolving attack vectors, and cutting-edge mitigation strategies for cybersecurity professionals.

item.title: UNION SQL and the Potential for SQL Injection
item.description: SQL is a powerful language for manipulating relational databases. The UNION operator provides a useful function for combining the results of multiple SELECT statements into a single result set. However, if misused, UNION can lead to a security risk called SQL injection.
